text: let's say you forgot to do your grocery
shopping last week and today we are now
putting the fridge there's only two
items left which are tomatoes and eggs
so what can you do with them today I
will be showing you three Vietnamese
ways to cook with just the two
ingredients so let's begin recipe to
make the tomato a dropship you want to
cut the tomato into thin slices crack
two eggs in a bowl add some pepper and a
teaspoon of fish sauce big well in a
saucepan add a tablespoon of vegetable
oil and fry some shredded Strube onion
white but only until fragrant then add
the tomatoes and stir fry for about one
to two minutes until top
then you want to add a teaspoon of
Vsauce and go for another minute until
the tomatoes cut a tune into a sauce and
four cups or one liters of water half a
teaspoon of salt and a teaspoon of
chicken stock bring it to a boil on high
heat and then turned out to medium-low
while the soup is simmering very slowly
pouring the beaten egg and gently stir
the soup in one direction the egg will
be cooked within seconds and form tiny
ribbons turn off the heat it just looks
so pretty just like clouds that's why I
call it cloud soup or can may transfer
to a large bowl and garnish with some
chopped spring onion or cilantro mmm
it's taste really good
if you want you can also cook some meat
together with the tomatoes to make the
scrambled eggs with tomato or turns out
you are similarly beat two eggs with
some pepper and Vsauce
in a pan add a teaspoon of vegetable oil
and fry some white pasty onion shred it
until fragrant then add the tomato
wedges and stir fry for about two
minutes
pouring the egg mixture and gently
scramble it together with the tomatoes
have a tight and add some more salt if
you wish that's it you are done transfer
to a plate garnish with some chopped
spring onion and some more black pepper
you can eat this with some baguette or a
hot steamed rice now let's make some
Vietnamese Thai omelet for the omelet
you want to dice two small Tomatoes
crack four eggs in a bowl and get well
until fluffy then you want to season
with two to three teaspoons of this
sauce also some sugar chicken stock and
pepper about a quarter teaspoon each
then mix well again to dissolve the
seasonings in a nonstick pan add a
tablespoon of vegetable oil and fry some
shredded spring onion white but only
until Highgarden
then add the diced tomatoes and
so five for about a minute spread the
dice tomato evenly on the base of the
pan and pour in the egg mixture then
garnish with some chopped spring onion
if you have then turn down the heat to
medium low to cook the omelet slowly you
want to make some holes and let the
liquid run through them to cook the eggs
faster make sure you control the heat
because it's very easy to get the bottom
of the omelet bones before the resurface
is cold
okay so when there's no liquid on the
surface of the omelette is done you can
transfer to a serving plate and serve at
the side dish of course you don't want
to cook all these three dishes in one
meal but I hope I have given you some
ideas what you cook as a side dish to
serve with hot steamed rice you can
combine them with other soups or our
dishes to complete a meal like today I
have a drinking with winter melon soup
very simple but super tasty and you know
what else I even more tasty all the
delicious foods that you cook and upload
photos on Instagram Facebook and Google+
